Improve this doc View source

uiGridOneBindAriaLabel
directive in module ui.grid

Description

One time binding for the aria-label dom tag. For more information see ui.grid.directive:uiGridOneBind. 

            <div ng-init="text='Add this text'" ui-grid-one-bind-aria-label="text"></div>
Will become: 
            <div ng-init="text='Add this text'" ui-grid-one-bind-aria-label="text" aria-label="Add this text"></div>

Usage

as attribute
<div ui-grid-one-bind-aria-label="{String}">
   ...
</div>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
uiGridOneBindAriaLabelString

The angular string you want to bind. Does not support interpolation. Don't use {{scopeElt}} instead use scopeElt.
